title: What Are You Doing? (Part 2)
body:
What Are You Doing? (Part 2)

"The monster guarding the treasure is already a goner, so who are these people fighting now..." Evan muttered in a baffled voice and looked into the distance, only to see four people fighting.

Among the four people, two had small builds with muscular bodies. Both of them were around one meter tall, had long, unkempt brown hair, messy beards, and fat noses.

"Dwarfs..." Evan muttered in a low voice as he observed the two short individuals fighting against two three-meter-tall monsters resembling Sabertooth Tigers.

"No, they are not monsters..." Evan suddenly noticed something and narrowed his eyes. "...They are beastkins fighting in their true forms."

Among the two dwarfs, one was a Beginner Level Rank Two Core Evolver while the other one was at the peak of Rank One. Similar to the dwarfs, the ranks of the beastkins were the same. One was at the beginner level of Rank Two while the other was at the peak of Rank One.
